description.value:
School abjuration; Level cleric/oracle 1, inquisitor 1, mesmerist 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range touch
Targets one object
Duration 1 day
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless, object); Spell Resistance yes

Description

You ward a single object in your possession against theft. You gain a +10 bonus on Perception checks to notice someone trying to take the object from you.
